QuestData.Title: Assault on the Throne of Kil'jaeden
QuestData.Description:
The Shadow Council are summoning their demonic masters upon a mountain they are calling the Throne of Kil'jaeden. Make no mistake; This is the most dangerous region in Tanaan.
Gather together a war party and assault the Throne of Kil'jaeden before the Legion gains a foothold here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Shadow Council at the Throne of Kil'jaeden in Tanaan Jungle.

Objectives.Objective: Assault the Shadow Council forces at the Throne of Kil'jaeden
